title: Set the system localization
content:
If your OO Workflow Designer system is localized, you will need to set the properties to reflect the system locale, in the designer-wrapper.conf file.

  1. Open the designer-wrapper.conf file in a text editor (located under <installation_folder>/designer/conf).
  2. Edit the following properties: 
    set.LANG=
set.LC_ALL=
set.LANGUAGE=
wrapper.java.additional.<x>=-Duser.language=
wrapper.java.additional.<x>=-Duser.country=

    For example, for Japanese: 
set.LANG=ja_JP 
set.LC_ALL=ja_JP
  3. Save the designer-wrapper.conf file.
